channel.title: Andrea Riseborough on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Andrea Riseborough on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Good Boy’ Review: Stephen Graham and Andrea Riseborough Lead an Intriguingly Odd but Frustratingly Empty Fable
item.description: Premiering at TIFF, the latest from Jan Komasa (‘Corpus Christi’) follows a family man who kidnaps and imprisons a troublemaking stranger, with plans to rehabilitate him.

item.title: Paul Andrew Williams Presents ‘Dragonfly’ to Edinburgh: “I Come From Making Stuff for Nothing… This Is a Truthful Film”
item.description: The director returns to EIFF with his new film, led by Andrea Riseborough and Brenda Blethyn, after nabbing the New Director’s Award for ‘London to Brighton’ in 2006: “It makes me a little bit emotion
